abstract: A profile of Andy Bechtolsheim: the man out to prove that the leading networking companies have missed the big opportunity.
snippet: A profile of Andy Bechtolsheim: the man out to prove that the leading networking companies have missed the big opportunity.

headline.main: A Switch for the Google Age

abstract: The blogging start-up that lets users publish short, simple blog posts has secured a third round of funding, first reported by MediaMemo.
snippet: The blogging start-up that lets users publish short, simple blog posts has secured a third round of funding, first reported by MediaMemo.

abstract: Google is in talks to acquire ITA Software, an airline technology and services provider, in a deal that could end up costing the search giant $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Google is in talks to acquire ITA Software, an airline technology and services provider, in a deal that could end up costing the search giant $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Google is in talks to acquire ITA Software, an airline technology and services provider, in a deal that could end up costing the search giant $1 billion, Bloomberg News reported, citing three people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Will Google Shell Out $1 Billion for ITA Software?

abstract: Google has acquired a secretive start-up, Agnilux, to help bring its popular Web operating systems onto a new generation of tablet computers.
snippet: Google has acquired a secretive start-up, Agnilux, to help bring its popular Web operating systems onto a new generation of tablet computers.
lead_paragraph: This week, Google took another step toward bringing its popular Web tools onto a myriad of nontraditional computing devices like tablet computers. It acquired a mysterious Silicon Valley start-up called Agnilux. PEHub first reported the acquisition on Tuesday; a price was not disclosed.

headline.main: Google Acquires Another Piece of the Tablet Puzzle

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Ashlee Vance

abstract: Disney names a new marketing chief, and goes outside the movie business to do so.
snippet: Disney names a new marketing chief, and goes outside the movie business to do so.
lead_paragraph: A five-month search for a marketing chief at Walt Disney Studios ended on Wednesday with the appointment of a Hollywood outsider: MT Carney, a Scottish-born and Sorbonne-educated communications strategist whose experience comes mostly from working with companies like Coca-Cola, Kraft, Google and American Express.

headline.main: Disney Names a New Marketing Chief
